welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Drensteinfurt, a charming city known for its stunning architecture and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the beauty this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Münster Osnabrück International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
